relation: Rules;; This is where the rules of the site may be found. Moderators: Talulah, Shadow♥-San

Staff Board;; Staff board only- sorry guys! : D Now we get to talk about you all. Nah, just joking. No, this is where staff members will talk about how to make the site better, upcoming plots, and other important boring matters. Moderators: Talulah, Shadow♥-San
Galleria de Valley Plains;; This is the site store! Come here and buy items, companions, and much more with your biscuits. All prices are fair and affordable :3 Moderators: Talulah, Shadow♥-San
Creativity Board;; So, this is the creativity board where members can share their works whether it be drawings, writings, songs- ANYTHING. You can post it here. Moderators: Talulah, Shadow♥-San

General Board;; You can talk about anything here, make games, talk about random stuff. Tell about your absence here Guest Friendly Moderators: Talulah, Shadow♥-San Sub-boards: Plot/ Plot Discussion;;, Retired Threads;;, Play Fight;;, Absence;;
